title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5624.11 - Direct disbursement from interest account prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5624.11 - Direct disbursement from interest account prohibited

State Regulations

The disbursement of net proceeds on deposit in an
interest-bearing account for one or more lawful purposes shall be made by
transferring the amount of the intended disbursement back into the "special
games of chance account," "special raffle account" or "special bell jar
account" and then withdrawing the amount therefrom in the manner prescribed in
section
4624.9
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5624.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
